content: a long time ago practical crocheter played around with making crocheted pentagonal shawls in net stitch it s a fun concept and very wearable one of her smaller pentagons my kids have been using for playing dress-up and it finally started to fall apart my 6yo who had been using it as a superhero cape asked me to make a replacement and that s what you see pictured below i used one 100 gram skein of worsted weight acrylic and a size h 5 mm hook this pattern can be made in any size any yarn and any gauge and has many possible uses it can be a shawl or superhero cape a light weight throw the basis for a net bag or you could make two to join together to use as a beach coverup whatever your plan the concept is fast and easy enjoy
